sn37.29:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.
sn37.29:4.3: Attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior.
sn37.29:4.4: A female who has the power of attractiveness but not the power of wealth
sn37.29:4.6: But when she has the power of attractiveness and the power of wealth
sn37.29:4.8: A female who has the powers of attractiveness and wealth, but not the power of relatives
sn37.29:4.10: But when she has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, and relatives
sn37.29:4.12: A female who has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, and relatives, but not the power of children
sn37.29:4.14: But when she has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, and children
sn37.29:4.16: A female who has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, and children, but not the power of ethical behavior
sn37.29:4.18: But when she has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior
sn37.29:4.20: These are the five powers of a female.”
